sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comtndeptjob ( DEPT_JOB_ID /* */ , DEPT_JOBBX_ID /* */ , DEPT_JOB_NM /* */ , DEPT_JOB_CN /* */ , ATCH_FILE_ID /* */ , CHARGER_ID /* */ , PRIORT /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ ) VALUES ( #deptJobId# /* */ , #deptJobbxId# /* */ , #deptJobNm# /* */ , #deptJobCn# /* */ , #atchFileId# /* */ , #chargerId# /* */ , #priort# /* */ , #frstRegisterId# /* */ , SYSDATE() /* */ , #lastUpdusrId# /* */ , #lastUpdtPnttm# /* */ )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comtndeptjob SET DEPT_JOB_ID=#deptJobId# /* */ , DEPT_JOBBX_ID=#deptJobbxId# /* */ , DEPT_JOB_NM=#deptJobNm# /* */ , DEPT_JOB_CN=#deptJobCn# /* */ , ATCH_FILE_ID=#atchFileId# /* */ , CHARGER_ID=#chargerId# /* */ , PRIORT=#priort# /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID=#frstRegisterId# /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM=#frstRegistPnttm# /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID=#lastUpdusrId# /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM=#lastUpdtPnttm# /* */ WHERE DEPT_JOB_ID=#deptJobId# /* */
sqlMap.select: SELECT DEPT_JOB_ID /* */ , DEPT_JOBBX_ID /* */ , DEPT_JOB_NM /* */ , DEPT_JOB_CN /* */ , ATCH_FILE_ID /* */ , CHARGER_ID /* */ , PRIORT /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ FROM comtndeptjob WHERE DEPT_JOB_ID=#deptJobId# /* */

SELECT DEPT_JOB_ID /* */ , DEPT_JOBBX_ID /* */ , DEPT_JOB_NM /* */ , DEPT_JOB_CN /* */ , ATCH_FILE_ID /* */ , CHARGER_ID /* */ , PRIORT /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ FROM comtndeptjob WHERE 1=1
DEPT_JOB_ID = #searchKeyword# /* */
DEPT_JOBBX_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%') /* */
ORDER BY DEPT_JOB_ID DESC /* */ limit #firstIndex#, #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM comtndeptjob WHERE 1=1
DEPT_JOB_ID = #searchKeyword# /* */
DEPT_JOBBX_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%') /* */
